backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor with types and state maps for videos, users, playlists, comments, AI generation, and saved images plus save/get operations with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and test IDs for updating YouTubeMe.co references to YouTubeMe.xyz.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries describing functionality of all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and UI elements.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document setting favicon, meta tags, title, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing routing, authentication, user profile loading, payment callback handling, and overall page state.
frontend/src/components/AddToPlaylistDia: Dialog component allowing authenticated users to add a video to existing or newly created playlists with create-and-add support.
frontend/src/components/ai-studio/Images: AI Studio section for generating, uploading, editing, and saving images, integrating generation API, promo editor, and saved image library.
frontend/src/components/ai-studio/PromoC: Canvas-based promo editor allowing text overlays, erasing, downloading, and saving composed images with metadata.
frontend/src/components/ai-studio/SavedI: Displays saved promo images with metadata, supports reopening images in the editor and deleting them.
frontend/src/components/AiEditDialog.tsx: Dialog component showing AI-generated title, description, and tag suggestions with options to apply individual or all changes.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, sidebar, footer, and main content area with navigation handlers.
frontend/src/components/CommentSection.t: Renders comments, handles posting, deleting, and pinning comments with subscription and authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying attribution, link to caffeine.ai, and an optional navigation button.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with branding, search, authentication controls, and subscription status display.
frontend/src/components/InternetIdentity: Dialog explaining Internet Identity login flow and offering a continue or cancel option.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting users to enter their name and save their initial profile.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Sidebar component that renders navigation buttons based on authentication, subscription status, and current page, with mobile open/close behavior.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin-only modal for configuring Stripe payments, handling secret key setup and payout destination submission.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Displays a video thumbnail, title, uploader, views, likes, and tags, with click actions for opening the video or channel.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, AI generation stats, purchases, and other backend interactions using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AiChatRoomPage.tsx: Implements a real-time AI chat room UI with message display and message posting.
frontend/src/pages/AiGenerationPaymentCa: Displays a cancellation notice for failed AI generation payments with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/AiGenerationPaymentSu: Verifies payment success and shows success or error messaging with navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/AiStudioPage.tsx: Page for generating AI videos/images with user-provided text, background images, and generation time limits, including purchase checks and navigation to upload.
frontend/src/pages/ChannelPage.tsx: Displays a user's channel and videos, with options to create or edit a channel if owned by the logged-in user.
frontend/src/pages/CreatorStudioPage.tsx: Creator dashboard showing the authenticated user's videos with editing and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoverPage.tsx: Landing page highlighting AI Studio, AI Chat Room, and YouTubeMe.xyz with navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadPaymentFailur: Informs the user that a video download payment was cancelled and provides navigation back to the video or home.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadPaymentSucces: Verifies a completed video download purchase and shows success or error states with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page that fetches and displays videos, supports search mode, loading states, and entry cards for AI Studio and AI Chat Room.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment cancelled message with options to return home or retry.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Verifies a Stripe payment session, updates subscription state, and displays success or error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/PlaylistDetailPage.ts: Loads a playlist and its associated videos, handling loading, not-found, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PlaylistsPage.tsx: Displays user playlists with creation dialog, handling authentication and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPage.tsx: Shows subscription plans, checks Stripe config, and initiates checkout for Premium upgrades.
frontend/src/pages/UploadPage.tsx: Video upload form supporting metadata entry, trimming, thumbnails, tags, and progress tracking with optional AI-studio prefilled inputs.
frontend/src/pages/VideoEditPage.tsx: Video metadata editor allowing title, description, tags, thumbnail updates, and AI-based suggestion generation.
frontend/src/pages/VideoPlayerPage.tsx: Video playback page with likes, views, comments, entitlement checks, purchasing, and download functionality.
frontend/src/pages/YouTubeMePage.tsx: Static informational page describing YouTubeMe.xyz features, integration, and purpose.
frontend/src/utils/aiEditHeuristics.ts: Local heuristic functions that improve titles, descriptions, and tags and generate AI-style edit suggestions.
frontend/src/utils/aiImageGenerator.ts: Client-side deterministic image generator using canvas with multiple styles and simulated progress.
frontend/src/utils/aiVideoGenerator.ts: Generates WebM videos client‑side using Canvas and MediaRecorder with resolution caps, fallbacks, and optional background images.
frontend/src/utils/canvasExport.ts: Provides utilities to export a canvas to PNG, get data/blob URLs, and load images from file blobs.
frontend/src/utils/contentPolicy.ts: Implements local keyword‑based detection of explicit content and returns standardized policy messages.
frontend/src/utils/fetchImageFromUrl.ts: Fetches and validates remote images with URL checks, CORS handling, and blob-to-image loading.
frontend/src/utils/networkGuards.ts: Contains local‑only operation guards and a stub validator ensuring no external AI API calls occur.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash‑routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Captures project state, scope changes, feature notes, and architectural constraints for MeTube/MeTube AI Studios.
